title: Maestro Error
body: Hello guys, I have been experiencing the maestro error message for a several days. Is there anyway to solve this problem? When I logged in or at the log in screen, the maestro error message would pop up and tell me to exit. I have tried letting it pass through the firewall and reinstalling but it didn't help. Please help me.

replies.body:
Maestro errors are generally a result of your client not being able to establish a stable connection to the Maestro service (server). Most of the time, problematic network settings are the culprit, and our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) does a great job at addressing the most common fixes.

Let me know if you continue to have issues with this.
